entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
